author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Let `edm::Wrapper<T>` use a special constructor `T{AllocateForOverwrite}` instead of the default constructor `T{}`, if the latter does not exist.

Remove the default constructor from `PortableCollection`, `PortableObject` and related types, and introduce the special constructor taking a `AllocateForOverwrite`.


#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass.
title: [RFC] Let `edm::Wrapper<T>` use a special constructor
